prompt_base: massive barrel-chested gray alien warrior, tan wrinkled skin, giant white horseshoe mustache, fierce unwavering gaze, red and black Pride Trooper uniform, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, visible pores and wrinkles on skin, hyperrealistic texture on the mustache strands, high quality fabric on uniform, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, human skin tone, doll, flat lighting, low quality, (friendly expression:1.3), skinny, underdeveloped
